ygData.subject: Re: Is there anyone out there still on this list?  No bugs here.
ygData.msgSnippet: I enjoy seeing the land.. I just like to see it once each time out... I enjoy walking there.. its the return trip thats a pain.  Especially when luggin all
ygData.messageBody:
I enjoy seeing the land.. I just like to see it once each time out... I
enjoy walking there.. its the return trip thats a pain. Especially when
luggin all that great junk I find back with me. Sanford and Son has nothing
on me.....

> -----Original Message-----
> From: King, Darrin [mailto:dking@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 1:41 PM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Is there anyone out there still on this list?
> No bugs here.
>
>
> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> *Do you all
> *just walk the land? Selling and buying from Innkeepers?
> *Anyway... I also really hate it when I use LOH on the MOB I'm
> *trying to
> *kill.... It never seems to appreciate it.
> *
>
> /smile Aye, I remember the early days of a Paladin's road.
>
> And yes, unless I have a high level druid or wizard friend do a group
> transport, I am running the land. But! The peril you encounter along the
> way! The friends you make and the enemies you earn! Much more exciting.
>
> And yes, after a long hiatus from my Paladin, I made the newbie
> (no offense)
> mistake of hitting LOH when the monster was still targeted. My solution
> (works for me, at least) is that I moved the hotbutton from the first bank
> of buttons with my combat buttons to the second one, so that when
> I think to
> change button banks I also think to change targets.
>
> May Tunare bless and keep you (and Erollisi Marr, although now in Final we
> high elves aren't permitted to worship her as Paladins... *grumble*)
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What was YOUR favorite part?!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Tell other Star Wars fans at ONElist!
>
>
